subject: RE: 171674 - [Type 3] Fund 6 vs. CGML : Portfolio Statement, Margin Notice
content:
Hi

We agree to the Exposure Calculation and Margin Call - RETURN USD 920,000 

Please return below US T for notional of USD 930,000 for value date 5 Sep 2018 to your official SSI.

SEC_NAME                                                                                ISIN                        MATURITY          NEXT CPN            MKT_PRICE        Hair Cut         MOODY_LONG FITCH_LONG            BALANCE

Please acknowledge receipt of this e-mail.

Kind Regards
Xxxxxx
